name: Gun War: Ultimate
description:
Presentation

A fight game with guns. Inspired by StickFight and Super Smash Bros

2 players fight in a level by using weapons. The more damage you take, the more your player is ejected when hurt. Kill your oponent 3 times to win

Controls

  • Player 1 : A-D to move Left-Right. Space to Jump. V to shoot and B to throw your weapon

  • Player 2 : Arrows to move Left-Right. Numpad Enter to jump. Numpad 0 to Shoot and Numpad "." to throw your weapon.

In the character selection screen, press space to select the Player1 character and Numpad 0 to select the player 2 character. Move keys are used to change character.

(Play in fullscreen is recommended)

Notes

Randy Pitchfordfocus "9/10 -  That's the most rigodrole game I ever played"

Erwin Coumanspreading "8/10 - I don't like guns but that physic is incredible"

Yves Guillemotdeltoro "9/10 - Graphics are exceptionnal"

David Goodenough "10/10 - ¯\_(ツ)_/¯"

Credits

All the 3D assets are from Kenney : https://www.kenney.nl/assets

FX from Synty Studios : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/simple-fx-cartoon-particles-...

Source
